name: Add new Inoreader articles to Google Sheets as rows
description: Stay organized and never miss important updates by automatically tracking articles from Inoreader and logging them into Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new article is published in your Inoreader feed, Make will seamlessly add a new row in your Google Sheets, allowing you to maintain a comprehensive archive of articles for easy reference and analysis. Perfect for researchers, content curators, or anyone looking to streamline their reading list!
